Meteara: I agree, but this is not my battle. Unless I am provoked, I 
will not intervene.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Sunhawk:  CAN WE PLEASE SETTLE THE ENERGON DEISPUTE
> LATER!  YOU CAN HAVE IT IF YOU WANT TO LET'S JUST TAKE
> OUT MEGATRON FIRST!
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Meteara: The so-called energon is our creation, as
> > well as this whole 
> > Vector. It is the life of this planet. Do you
> > understand more now?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > > ::Kup::
> > > 
> > > He had been silent about this encounter at first,
> > but now 
> > transformed to bot mode.
> > > 
> > > "Ok, lets all just cool down here."
> > > 
> > > Kup looks right at the Vok.
> > > 
> > > "Vok, eh? I think i heard about you after Primal's
> > crew returned. So 
> > your are here for the uniqe energon as well? Dont
> > take this the wrong 
> > way, but what's it to you?"
> > 
> >
